body:
##### Modifications :
- [x] added a static method to `EnvironmentModifications` that constructs instances from sourcing a file
- [x] added unit tests
##### Note

To modify the current environment replicating the effect of sourcing a bunch of files : 

``` python
env = EnvironmentModifications.from_sourcing_files(*files)
env.execute()
```

Note that this PR is an alternative to #1018 that builds an `EnvironmentModifications` instance instead of modifying directly the environment. This makes it possible to manipulate what the `source <file>` would do for other purposes than just modifying the current environment.
title: feature : construct environment modifications sourcing files
